contentList.content: Welcome back, my friend. I see you're gracing us with your presence again.
To what do I owe the pleasure?
You…afraid? I find that difficult to believe, considering you’re the first to charge into danger, ever the hero.
And they say I'm the grumpy one. Please, continue.
Oh! Gods, really? I mean, yes, of course!
A celebration sounds fitting. I'll let Cal and Lia know and we'll begin making preparations.
A celebration sounds fitting. I'll let Cal know and we'll begin making preparations.
A celebration sounds fitting. I'll let Lia know and we'll begin making preparations.
Actually, there’s something I wanted to ask you before, but I was afraid-
I was afraid of appearing greedy, as you once said, but I don’t give a damn anymore.
Are you quite done? I've other places to be... "hero" things to do.
I’d like to spend some time together one evening... just the two of us. What do you think?
It's a date, then. I'll visit again one evening soon.
I have a proposal for the Master of Ramazith's Tower.
There's much to celebrate! How about I come over one evening soon?
I was imagining something more... private.
